content.rendered:
Photo via Unsplash

A new premium theme for freelancers, Shay Bocks talks about niching down, and find (or be) a code mentor thanks to a new initiative from Calvin Koepke.

Themes

Matt Whiteley’s done it again, his latest Genesis theme, FreelancePro looks the part and is now available for purchase.

Latest #genesiswp #wordpress theme is now available! FreelancePro caters to the freelancers but is super flexible: https://t.co/IPLMLt2dUN

— Matt Whiteley (@whiteleydesigns) June 19, 2017

Stealing scrolling homepage idea from @Sara11D 😎. Home page of new #genesiswp #wordpress FreelancePro Theme. pic.twitter.com/KVw7ujfmDD

— Matt Whiteley (@whiteleydesigns) June 19, 2017

He also shared a few more details about FreelancePro, on this very website.

FreelancePro Genesis Child Theme

And he’s also launched an affiliate programme.

Affiliate program is up and running (thanks @affwp). Join now! Just launched my second theme! #genesiswp #wordpress https://t.co/Q4ezDCXgVh pic.twitter.com/4JiWsmM5hQ

— Matt Whiteley (@whiteleydesigns) June 21, 2017

Showcase

Joe Dooley for yourmembership.com

Launched a new #genesiswp #WordPress site for @yourmembership . Check it out https://t.co/vay6Xm0N9k . Graphics/SVG by @BeTheBreeze @jdelia pic.twitter.com/KFMSCU1Bk0

— Joe Dooley (@devdesignstampa) June 20, 2017

Cami MacNamara for eatlikeayogi.com

New #genesiswp website by Webcami using Cook'd Theme by @feastdesignco.https://t.co/DIF4iV6iij pic.twitter.com/qEpAxBNtM7

— Cami MacNamara (@webcami) June 21, 2017

Best of the rest

Calvin Koepke has launched a new mentorship programme to connect those looking to level up their development skills with those that would like to help them.

Become a code mentor or mentee, for free. Join the network and make this 🔥 –> https://t.co/SkUnS8CFIY

— Calvin (@cjkoepke) June 20, 2017

Shay Bocks, the creative force behind some first class ‘foodie’ themes for Genesis, talks to Flywheel about niching down.

Honored to have had the chance to chat with @HeyFlywheel about niching down! #wordpress #genesiswp https://t.co/pGSP9825oj

— Shay Bocks (@feastdesignco) June 22, 2017

Michael Shaker walks you through the basics of creating a dynamic WordPress page template with Genesis.

New on the blog: How to create dynamic, custom page templates with #GenesisWP https://t.co/1p0UR04Zkh by @mchlshkr

— EngageWP (@EngageWP) June 22, 2017

Sridhar Katakam shows you how to make featured images clickable in the Generate Pro theme…

How to make featured images clickable in Generate Pro:https://t.co/RFKKzShbmA#GenesisWP pic.twitter.com/FjsX8cVYB6

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) June 23, 2017

how to remove dates from posts in Genesis…

How to remove Dates from Posts in Genesis:https://t.co/NYRUEK0j5s#GenesisWP pic.twitter.com/umSDEiEMRl

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) June 17, 2017

how to insert HTML between the title area and header widget area in Genesis, and…

How to insert HTML between Title Area and Header Widget Area in Genesis:https://t.co/7NUjbGFYgu#GenesisWP pic.twitter.com/1hF7NHIjVE

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) June 17, 2017

how to remove the dark overlay on hero images in Showcase Pro.

How to remove dark overlay on hero images in Showcase Pro:https://t.co/GSAMcNcidh#GenesisWP

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) June 18, 2017
